Generation IX.Scarlet: It gathers things up in an apron made from shed feathers added to the Pokémon’s chest feathers, then drops those things from high places for fun.
Generation IX.Violet: Bombirdier uses the apron on its chest to bundle up food, which it carries back to its nest. It enjoys dropping things that make loud noises.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area Six West Province: Area One , Area Three , West Paldean Sea West Province: Area One Former Titan ( Only one ) Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ , 6★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area Six West Province: Area One , Area Three , West Paldean Sea West Province: Area One Former Titan ( Only one ) Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ , 6★ )
